trans-unit.source: Troubleshoot Application Insights in a Windows devices
trans-unit.target: Troubleshoot Application Insights in a Windows devices

trans-unit.source: Troubleshooting guide and question and answer.
trans-unit.target: Troubleshooting guide and question and answer.

trans-unit.source: Troubleshooting and Q&A for Application Insights for Windows devices
trans-unit.target: Troubleshooting and Q&A for Application Insights for Windows devices

trans-unit.source: Questions or problems with [Visual Studio Application Insights in Windows][windows]?
trans-unit.target: Questions or problems with [Visual Studio Application Insights in Windows][windows]?

trans-unit.source: Here are some tips.
trans-unit.target: Here are some tips.

trans-unit.source: No data
trans-unit.target: No data

trans-unit.source: I added Application Insights successfully and ran my app, but I've never seen data in the portal.
trans-unit.target: I added Application Insights successfully and ran my app, but I've never seen data in the portal.

trans-unit.source: Wait a minute and click Refresh.
trans-unit.target: Wait a minute and click Refresh.

trans-unit.source: Currently, refresh isn't automatic.
trans-unit.target: Currently, refresh isn't automatic.

trans-unit.source: Check that you have an instrumentation key defined in the ApplicationInsights.config file, and that it is the same as the key in the Application Insights portal.
trans-unit.target: Check that you have an instrumentation key defined in the ApplicationInsights.config file, and that it is the same as the key in the Application Insights portal.

trans-unit.source: To see the key, click Essentials on the overview blade.
trans-unit.target: To see the key, click Essentials on the overview blade.

trans-unit.source: Make sure your app [requests outgoing network access](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh452752.aspx).
trans-unit.target: Make sure your app [requests outgoing network access](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh452752.aspx).

trans-unit.source: Is there a firewall between your emulator or test device and the Application Insights portal?
trans-unit.target: Is there a firewall between your emulator or test device and the Application Insights portal?

trans-unit.source: You might have to open TCP ports 80 and 443 for outgoing traffic to dc.services.visualstudio.com and f5.services.visualstudio.com.
trans-unit.target: You might have to open TCP ports 80 and 443 for outgoing traffic to dc.services.visualstudio.com and f5.services.visualstudio.com.

trans-unit.source: In the Microsoft Azure start board, look at the service status map.
trans-unit.target: In the Microsoft Azure start board, look at the service status map.

trans-unit.source: If there are some alert indications, wait until they have returned to OK and then close and re-open your Application Insights application blade.
trans-unit.target: If there are some alert indications, wait until they have returned to OK and then close and re-open your Application Insights application blade.

trans-unit.source: I used to see data, but it has stopped
trans-unit.target: I used to see data, but it has stopped

trans-unit.source: Check the [status blog](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/applicationinsights-status/).
trans-unit.target: Check the [status blog](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/applicationinsights-status/).

trans-unit.source: Have you hit your monthly quota of data points?
trans-unit.target: Have you hit your monthly quota of data points?

trans-unit.source: Open Settings/Quota and Pricing to find out.
trans-unit.target: Open Settings/Quota and Pricing to find out.

trans-unit.source: If so, you can upgrade your plan, or pay for additional capacity.
trans-unit.target: If so, you can upgrade your plan, or pay for additional capacity.

trans-unit.source: See the [pricing scheme](http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/details/application-insights/).
trans-unit.target: See the [pricing scheme](http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/details/application-insights/).

trans-unit.source: How do I add Application Insights to a Universal App?
trans-unit.target: How do I add Application Insights to a Universal App?

trans-unit.source: Add the NuGet packages manually to each device project in your solution.
trans-unit.target: Add the NuGet packages manually to each device project in your solution.

trans-unit.source: See [Getting Started - Universal apps][universal].
trans-unit.target: See [Getting Started - Universal apps][universal].

trans-unit.source: Disabling telemetry
trans-unit.target: Disabling telemetry

trans-unit.source: How can I disable telemetry collection?
trans-unit.target: How can I disable telemetry collection?

trans-unit.source: In code:
trans-unit.target: In code:

trans-unit.source: Changing the target resource
trans-unit.target: Changing the target resource

trans-unit.source: How can I change which Application Insights resource my project sends data to?
trans-unit.target: How can I change which Application Insights resource my project sends data to?

trans-unit.source: In the new Application Insights overview blade, open Essentials and copy the instrumentation key.
trans-unit.target: In the new Application Insights overview blade, open Essentials and copy the instrumentation key.

trans-unit.source: Paste the key into your ApplicationInsights.config file in the `<InstrumentationKey>` node.
trans-unit.target: Paste the key into your ApplicationInsights.config file in the `<InstrumentationKey>` node.

trans-unit.source: Or, if you want to change targets at run time, use:
trans-unit.target: Or, if you want to change targets at run time, use:

trans-unit.source: How do I monitor a client-server app?
trans-unit.target: How do I monitor a client-server app?

trans-unit.source: There are two ways of doing this:
trans-unit.target: There are two ways of doing this:

trans-unit.source: Create two Application Insights resources (with different instrumentation keys), for the client and the server.
trans-unit.target: Create two Application Insights resources (with different instrumentation keys), for the client and the server.

trans-unit.source: But create them in the same Azure resource group.
trans-unit.target: But create them in the same Azure resource group.

trans-unit.source: That makes it easy to switch between one and the other.
trans-unit.target: That makes it easy to switch between one and the other.

trans-unit.source: Use one Application Insights resource and put its instrumentation key into both client and server projects.
trans-unit.target: Use one Application Insights resource and put its instrumentation key into both client and server projects.

trans-unit.source: Then you can correlate metrics and events from the two sources.
trans-unit.target: Then you can correlate metrics and events from the two sources.

trans-unit.source: To help correlate events in the client and server, generate an operation id for each request.
trans-unit.target: To help correlate events in the client and server, generate an operation id for each request.

trans-unit.source: Transmit it between the client and server, add it to the telemetry at both ends:
trans-unit.target: Transmit it between the client and server, add it to the telemetry at both ends:

trans-unit.source: The Azure start screen
trans-unit.target: The Azure start screen

trans-unit.source: I'm looking at [the Azure portal](http://portal.azure.com).
trans-unit.target: I'm looking at [the Azure portal](http://portal.azure.com).

trans-unit.source: Does the map tell me something about my app?
trans-unit.target: Does the map tell me something about my app?

trans-unit.source: No, it shows the health of Azure servers around the world.
trans-unit.target: No, it shows the health of Azure servers around the world.

trans-unit.source: From the Azure start board (home screen), how do I find data about my app?
trans-unit.target: From the Azure start board (home screen), how do I find data about my app?

trans-unit.source: Assuming you [already set up your app for Application Insights][windows], click Browse, select Application Insights, and select the resource you created for your app.
trans-unit.target: Assuming you [already set up your app for Application Insights][windows], click Browse, select Application Insights, and select the resource you created for your app.

trans-unit.source: To get there faster in future, you can pin the resource to the start board.
trans-unit.target: To get there faster in future, you can pin the resource to the start board.

trans-unit.source: Data retention
trans-unit.target: Data retention

trans-unit.source: How long is data retained in the portal?
trans-unit.target: How long is data retained in the portal?

trans-unit.source: Is it secure?
trans-unit.target: Is it secure?

trans-unit.source: See [Data retention and privacy][data].
trans-unit.target: See [Data retention and privacy][data].
